pageContent: Objective: The purpose of this article is to review the multiparametric magnetic resonance imaging (mMRI) of the prostate and MR-guided prostate biopsy, and their role in the evaluation and management of men with low-risk prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Prostate cancer-specific survival in elderly patients
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21383304/
